message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[10-May-2025 06:39:41 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_cs_posts ( postid mediumint(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, defaultpage VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, prefix VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, parameter VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, header_title VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', header_desc VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', header_desc_char_limit SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 200, available TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (postid, parameter) );

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
Error occurred at line 4117 in Function handle_error. Error message was: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
